  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La conquesta de l'espai al segle XXI</string>
            <string language="en">The conquest of space in the 21st century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Eroberung des Platzes im 21. Jahrhundert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La conquête de l'espace au 21ème siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conquest do espaço no século XXI</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La conquista di spazio nel ventunesimo secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατάκτηση του διαστήματος στο 21$ο αιώνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Relació de les missions espacials (sondes, objectius de cada missió, data prevista de llançament i agència) previstes per als inicis del s. XXI.</string>
            <string language="en">List of space missions (probes, mission objectives, anticipated launching date, space agency) planned for the beginning of the 21st century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">astronomia</string>
            <string language="en">astronomy</string>
            <string language="es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liste der Platzmissionen (Prüfspitzen, die 
Mission Lernziele, vorweggenommen ausstoßendes Datum, sperren 
Agentur), plante für den Anfang des 21. Jahrhunderts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La liste de missions d'espace (les sondes, 
objectifs de mission, prévus date de lancement, espacent l'agence) a 
projeté pour le début du 21ème siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A lista de missões de espaço (as pontas de 
prova, objetivos da missão, antecipados data se lançando, espaçam a
agência) planeou para o começo do século XXI.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lista delle missioni spaziali (sonde, 
obiettivi di missione, previsti data di lancio, spaziano l'agenzia) ha
progettato per l'inizio del ventunesimo secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατάλογος διαστημικών αποστολών (οι έλεγχοι, στόχοι 
αποστολής, προσδόκησαν την ημερομηνία, τη διαστημική 
αντιπροσωπεία) που προγραμματίζονται για την αρχή του 21$ου αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
